title: Solving for $$t$$

title: Half-life
text: Observe that the expression, $$\frac{y}{A_0}$$ within the natural log expression is the proportion of the object's mass left. At half-life, this would be 50% or $$0.5$$.
speech: Observe that the expression,  fraction, y over,   a sub 0,   within the natural log expression is the proportion of the object's mass left. At half-life, this would be 50% or  0.5 .

title: Substitution
